description: The second Baron of Febdak and father of Klowal. Srguf`s mother was the first Baroness, who gained distinction by rising through the Imperial Star Force, or Labule (Laburec). Due to his being a genetic "grounder," his own son despised him resulting in confinement and isolation. He eventually befriended Jinto and aided Lafiel in "punishing" Klowal. His daughter, Lo√Øc eventually became the Baroness of Febdak and a commanding officer to Lafiel and Jinto.
name: Atosryua Syun-Atos Lyuf Raika Febdak Srguf
